speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: We thought we’d give you an update on the hurricane. We got lucky in Florida. Very, very lucky indeed. We had actually, our original chart, was that it was going to be hitting Florida directly. Maybe I could just see that, Kevin.
headlin: Donald Trump Sharpie Altered Dorian Map Statement – Hurricane Dorian Update Transcript

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: It was going to be hitting directly and that would have affected a lot of other states, but that was the original chart, and you see it was going to hit not only Florida, but Georgia, could have…
headlin: Donald Trump Sharpie Altered Dorian Map Statement – Hurricane Dorian Update Transcript

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: Was going toward the Gulf. That was what was originally projected, and it took a right turn. And ultimately, hopefully we’re going to be lucky.
headlin: Donald Trump Sharpie Altered Dorian Map Statement – Hurricane Dorian Update Transcript

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: It depends on what happens with South Carolina, North Carolina.
headlin: Donald Trump Sharpie Altered Dorian Map Statement – Hurricane Dorian Update Transcript
